title: Job Vacancies at Shengway Global Merchant Limited
content:
Shengway Global Merchant Limited is a retail trading company, operating with the brand name “MINISO”. MINISO is a fast-growing international retail chain brand with over 6000 stores across Europe, Asia, Africa, America and Oceania and has established strategic partnerships with over 100 countries.
     

            
    



MINISO focuses on fashionable and relaxed high-quality lifestyle products including electronics, personal care and beauty, home essentials, sports, gifts, toys, stationery, seasonal products, amongst many others, which covers every aspect of life. In addition to the quality and creativity, MINISO values the shopping experience of its customers and dedicates itself to being a fashionable, close-to-life brand that provides customers with a better shopping experience. Shengway Global Merchant Ltd (Miniso Nigeria) has several stores in the country.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Driver

Job Location: Victoria Island / Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a reliable and safety-conscious driver to join our team.
	The role requires someone with a valid driver's license, a clean driving record, and strong knowledge of traffic laws and routes.


Responsibilities


	Follow assigned routes and schedules; and ensuring promptness.
	Inspect vehicles regularly for maintenance issues and report any problems immediately.
	Keep accurate records of trips, mileage, fuel usage, and any incidents.
	Maintain cleanliness and good condition of assigned vehicle(s).
	Adhere to all traffic laws and company safety policies.
	Renew vehicle particulars at the right time before expiration.
	Assist with logistics and other duties as assigned by the supervisor.


Requirements 


	Minimum of 3 years’ professional driving experience.
	Must possess a valid driver’s license.
	Should reside in close proximity to Victoria Island/Ikoyi.
	Clean driving record with no major traffic violations.
	Familiarity with GPS devices, navigation apps, and local roadways.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr_ng@miniso.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) E-commerce Customer Care Representative

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assist customers with placing orders, tracking shipments/delivery, and processing returns.
	Provide product information and recommendations to customers.
	Post company-related activities to the WHATSAPP platform.
	Collaborate with other departments, to ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions.
	Identify and escalate complex issues to supervisors/ line manager.
	Stay up to date with product knowledge and industry trends to provide excellent customer service.
	Meet and exceed customer satisfaction goals and performance metrics.
	Continuously improve customer care processes and procedures.
	Ensuring that consumers are satisfied with products or services by handling complaints and inquiries.
	Flexible availability including weekends and holidays.


Qualifications 


	Bachelor's Degree or Higher National Diploma.
	Minimum of 3 years of customer service experience in ecommerce.
	Relevant professional qualification or certification.
	Proficiency in ecommerce platforms and customer service software.


Skills Required:


	Excellent Communication, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
	Strong Knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite.
	Ability to handle high volume customer interactions.
	Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
	Effective time management skills.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks.
	Detail-oriented and accurate data entry.
	Experience with CRM and ticketing systems.
	Familiarity with Ecommerce platforms and order workflows.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr_ng@miniso.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Customer Care Representative

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assist customers with placing orders, tracking shipments/delivery, and processing returns.
	Provide product information and recommendations to customers.
	Post company-related activities to the WhatsApp platform.
	Collaborate with other departments, to ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions.
	Identify and escalate complex issues to supervisors/ line manager.
	Stay up to date with product knowledge and industry trends to provide excellent customer service.
	Meet and exceed customer satisfaction goals and performance metrics.
	Continuously improve customer care processes and procedures.
	Ensuring that consumers are satisfied with products or services by handling complaints and inquiries.
	Flexible availability including weekends and holidays.


Qualifications 


	Bachelor's Degree or Higher National Diploma.
	Minimum of 2 years of customer service experience in an ecommerce environment.
	Relevant professional qualification or certification.
	Proficiency in ecommerce platforms and customer service software.


Skills:


	Excellent Communication, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
	Strong Knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite.
	Ability to handle high volume customer interactions.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks.
	Detail-oriented and accurate data entry.
	Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
	Effective time management skills.
	Experience with CRM and ticketing systems.
	Familiarity with Ecommerce platforms and order workflows.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr_ng@miniso.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Human Resources Manager Job at R & R Recruiting Services
content:
Recruitment Agency, Training, Consulting & Human Resources Management

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Manager
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Days: Monday – Saturday
Industry: Hospitality (American Cuisine Restaurant)

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced HR Manager to lead recruitment, training, employee relations, performance management, and compliance.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee day-to-day HR operations and team management
	Lead talent acquisition and onboarding processes
	Design and implement HR strategies aligned with business goals
	Maintain a positive, productive work culture
	Handle disciplinary actions, staff grievances, and conflict resolution
	Monitor HR metrics and prepare regular reports
	Ensure compliance with labor laws and company policies.


Requirements


	Proven experience as an HR Manager in the hospitality or service industry
	Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills
	Excellent knowledge of HR functions and labor laws
	Ability to multitask and work under pressure.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: r2recruitmentservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more information, WhatsApp: 09035411252.

Our unique model integrates best-of-breed technologies from global leaders such as Juniper Networks, Blue Coat, Polycom, AirWatch, F5, Extreme Networks and VMware, coupled with our next-generation metro fiber networks, to offer unparalleled services and after sales support to some of the most demanding customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Key Account Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Summary


	The Key Account Manager (Enterprise) is responsible for managing key accounts, maintaining a long-term relationship with accounts and maximizing sales opportunities within them.
	He/she will need a high level of an innovative and eager mind in order to research, propose, and sell services and respond effectively to clients’ queries.


Job Responsibilities


	Focusing on growing and developing existing clients, together with generating new business.
	Develop, penetrate and maintain relationships with key decision makers at existing key accounts through regular planned contact
	Meet and exceed yearly sales target.
	Develop a solid understanding of all unique purchasing/sourcing processes, procedures and decision criteria to formulate a strategic account penetration plan detailing the actions necessary to effectively and profitably close orders with each account.
	Analyze customer needs and identify product solutions to fit needs, desires and budget.
	Search for new clients and create database of prospects that will benefit from company products or services and maximize customer potential in designated regions.
	Playing an integral role in new business pitches and hold responsibility for the effective on-boarding of new clients. Write business plans for all current and opportunity tender business.
	Develop long-term relationships with customers
	Manage and interpret customer requirements - speaking with clients to understand, anticipate and meet their needs;
	Negotiate tender and contract terms to meet both client and company needs;
	Administer client accounts;
	Analyzing costs and sales Record and maintain client contact data
	Act as the key interface between the customer and all relevant divisions.


Qualifications


	University Degree or its equivalent, preferably in Computer/Electrical/Electronics Engineering or Computer Science is required.
	3 - 5 years field sales and account management professional experience with an ICT Solutions Provider.
	Relevant experience in sale of IT services with knowledge of solutions from Juniper Networks, Blue Coat, F5, Cisco and VMware will be an added advantage.
	Experience in Enterprise Solutions.
